new_skill_specs.name: compare_derivatives_from_graph
new_skill_specs.purpose: Determine the relative size of the derivatives of a function at two given points by analyzing the slopes of the tangent lines on a graph.
new_skill_specs.outputs: A string indicating whether the derivative at point1 is 'larger', 'equal', or 'smaller' than at point2.
edge_cases: Graph is not clear enough to determine slopes
Points are not on the graph
